net.jawr.web.servlet
Class JawrServlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          net.jawr.web.servlet.JawrServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
Direct Known Subclasses:
JawrGrailsServlet
public class JawrServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

Main Jawr servlet. Maps logical URLs to script bundles, which are generated on the fly (may be cached), and served as a single javascript file.

Author:
Jordi Hernández Sellés
See Also:
